Name: Battle Imagine - Muku Warrior
Description:
Activates or advances the Battle Imagine skill of Muku Warrior - Stunt! Super Critical.

Stunt! Super Critical
Resonates with the power of Elite Muku Warrior, leaps forward to launch a powerful attack, dealing area Attack Damage. This attack is guaranteed to deliver Crit DMG, and increases your Crit rate and Crit DMG bonus for 20s.
Description2: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
